directions: In food processor, purée dates until smooth. Add bananas, raisins, wine, and date syrup and process to combine. Add walnuts, pistachios, almonds, cinnamon, allspice, ginger, nutmeg, and cloves and process until smooth. Store, covered, at room temperature until ready to serve.
ingredients: 1/4 cup sweet red wine such as Manischewitz Extra Heavy Malaga
1/2 cup unsalted shelled pistachio nuts (not dyed red), toasted
title: Sephardic Charoset
